channel.title: Making Monsters Able To Have More Than One Person Attack?
channel.description:
Hey guys.
Well, let me explain. Today, I added Godwars to my server, but when more than one person tries to attack one of the Bosses, it simply says 'Somebody is already fighting _____' etc.
I was wondering if anybody would be able to quickly tell/show me how to make it so more than one person can attack these at a time? If so, that would be excellent.
Thank you, Jackson.

item.title: Making Monsters Able To Have More Than One Person Attack?
item.dc:creator: @Ace1 Ace.
item.description:
@Ace1 wrote:

Hey guys.

Well, let me explain. Today, I added Godwars to my server, but when more than one person tries to attack one of the Bosses, it simply says ‘Somebody is already fighting _____’ etc.

I was wondering if anybody would be able to quickly tell/show me how to make it so more than one person can attack these at a time? If so, that would be excellent.

Thank you,
Jackson.
